title: Sinatra: An American Icon
short: The New York Public Library for the Performing Arts and The Grammy Museum present an exhibition exploring the life and career of Frank Sinatra, which will include portraits by Herman Leonard. March 3rd-September 4th, 2015.

title: Recollections: Jazz photos by Herman Leonard
short: Exhibition of Herman Leonard’s work at the Denison Museum. From February 12, 2015- May 16, 2015
